meanings.def: the 11th month of the year, between October and December
examples: (British English) The meeting is on the fifth of November/​November the fifth.
(North American English) The meeting is on November fifth.
We went to Japan last November.
I arrived at the end of November.
It was a cold November night.
The competition will be held in New Delhi from November 19th to November 22nd.
In November 1945 he travelled from Moscow to Leningrad.
The report came five years after the floods of November 2000.
